name: Human Changes, Climate Changes
description:
Made in Go Game Jam in Konya,Turkey. Our team name was TUGOS Games. Made it about 48 hours. Have fun.

Control schematic:

W-A-S-D : Movement

Space Key: Interaction

Known Bugs:

-Fog isn't good enough can be bugged sometimes.

-Light system is little bit buggy too.

Check out source code from there: https://github.com/tugcantopaloglu/go-game-hackaton

Thanks to all asset creators which is used in this project check out their products!:
